description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Legend of Aylesbury is a 2 player co-operative platformer where a couple must rescue their pet duck using their unique abilities. One player can turn into a bird, the other can use their grapple hook and together they can perform co-operative actions to span the landscape.
description.short: The Legend of Aylesbury is a 2 player co-operative platformer where a couple must rescue their pet duck using their unique abilities. One player can turn into a bird, the other can use their grapple hook and together they can perform co-operative actions to span the landscape.
